title: Chocolate Crepes Cake
instructions:
Quick And Easy Desserts

Making Crepes :


Achieve 16 crepes as follows:

Prepare a hazelnut butter, that is to say, cook the butter in a saucepan over high heat for 1 minute, they will become brown.

In a bowl, add the flour, salt, sugar and form a fountain. Break the eggs in the center and mix gently pouring the milk gradually. Add the hazelnut butter and mixture together until it smooth dough, then let it sit for about 1 hour.

In a hot crepe pan (the same diameter as the cake pan used to mounting
the cake), pour a ladle of batter into the pan
and cook for about 2 minutes on each side (by monitoring the color).
Then let them cool.


For Filling :

Melt the chocolate and butter in a double boiler. When they are still warm, add the sugar. Add Nutella and mix well, then add the egg and egg yolks and mix well again.


For the Chocolate Glaze :

Preheat oven to 180 Â°C (th. 6-7).

If necessary, cut the crepes the same size as the cake pan. butter the sides of the cake pan and put a circle of baking parchment paper on the bottom.

Start by putting down one crepe, and then cover it with chocolate mixture. Then put again another crepe and chocolate, and so on up the cake pan. Finish with a crepe.

Bake for 15 minutes, and then cool almost completely before unmolding on a platter.

Frost the chocolate cake

and decorate with the chips chocolate for example.
That's all if you want to make a Quick And Easy Desserts

Notes :

"if you want stands well your cake, make enough pancakes."

More Recipes here : http://www.qaedesserts.com
